combined_features_request.query: Wearable sensors for monitoring livestock health
combined_features_request.ranking_guidance: Rank based on practical applicability and validation in real-world farm settings.

queries.query: TITLE-ABS-KEY((livestock OR cattle OR sheep OR poultry OR pigs OR goats) AND (health OR wellbeing OR welfare) AND (sensor* OR "wearable device*"))
TITLE-ABS-KEY(("animal monitoring" OR "livestock monitoring") AND (sensor* OR "wearable technology") AND (health OR disease OR behavior))

title:("wearable sensor" OR "wearable device" OR "body-worn sensor") AND abstract:(livestock OR cattle OR sheep OR poultry OR swine OR goats) AND abstract:(health monitoring OR disease detection OR vital signs OR physiological parameters)

title:(livestock OR cattle OR sheep OR poultry OR swine OR goats) AND abstract:("wearable sensor" OR "remote monitoring") AND abstract:(health OR wellbeing OR welfare) AND abstract:(accelerometer OR gyroscope OR ECG OR "body temperature")
